TEXT.S:
Heping Nsgan Heping o gaga Nsgan Taichung, kmpraan kana dxgal o 1,006.12 km², (dxgal dgiyaq o 900.79 km², dxgal pmblxan o 62.11 km²). kmhbragan hiyi o 6,503, sapah o 2,544, seejiq tnpusu 3,838 hiyi, knhbragan hiyi o 59%(Embgala). Nsgan alang o seejiq klmukan ka pusu(hbaraw) balay.
nyusan qpahan Nsgan Heping o niqan 8 alang ni maxal 13. 13 o, Sqoyaw, Tabuk, Slamaw, Lilang, M'ihu, Tgbin, L'olu, Kling, Pasing, Slamaw, Tbulan, S'yux, Hrung.
